item.title: Caution: Stay away from making your Android app free for a short time
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Just read this over at the Android Developers google forum: My app had a one-day sale on all platforms and app stores. The price went from 2.99 to free for just today, but now that the sale is over, I need to revert the price back to 2.99. The bad news is, the developer console will not let me change it! I have to pull the app until I can get this resolved.
